items.q: What is the first element on the periodic table to have an atomic mass greater than 100 u?
items.explanation: Ruthenium (Ru) has an atomic mass of about 101 u.

items.q: The speed of light changes as it passes through water.
items.explanation: Light slows down as it enters a denser medium like water.
